duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct benefit investigations, verify insurance benefits, and obtain prior authorizations as required by payer.
Accurately enter and maintain data in client database and patient files.
Participate in conference calls with Client Sales Representatives and physicians offices regarding status of cases and drug orders.
Coordinate order for product, shipment of product, and therapy initiation with pharmacy and patient.
Triage and respond to incoming calls from patients, insurance companies, physicians, Sales Reps, pharmacies, and homecare agencies.
Identify and report events as required by the REMS requirements for specified medication.
Educate patients, prescribers, and others regarding program requirements, and facilitate referrals.
Maintain adherence to quality and production standards and comply with all applicable company, state, and federal safety and environmental programs and procedures.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED or equivalent experience.
